duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in audits and compliance reviews of company technology functions.
Identify risks, test controls, and document test results for financial integrity, operational effectiveness, and compliance.
Develop and execute specific testing procedures.
Analyze findings and test results and make appropriate recommendations for problem areas noted.
Prepare documentation in adherence to internal audit professional standards.
Contribute to the preparation of issues and findings including recommendations for improvement.
Consistently adhere to internal audit professional standards and best practices.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS in Computer Science/MIS or related discipline. (Master's preferred)
